attributes.action: Stop changes to animal welfare reform
attributes.background: According to a Guardian article, the government is considering repealing animal welfare codes. Another example of where profits come before welfare of people, animals and the environment. Animal welfare laws are already slack; giving the poultry industry the power to decide the rules is unethical.

rejection.details:
We think the following petition is similar to yours:
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/125827
